title: Welcome to your Glassmorphism Todo App
description: This is your first todo item. You can edit, complete, or delete it anytime.

title: Try adding a new todo
description: Click the add button to create your own todo items with custom categories and priorities.

title: Explore the filter options
description: Use the filter buttons to view todos by status, priority, or category.

title: Test the search functionality
description: Use the search bar to quickly find specific todos by title, description, or tags.

title: Customize your workspace
description: Organize your todos with different categories and priority levels to stay productive.
